meanings.definition: A person or thing of enormous size or power.
meanings.sent1: In the story, the goliaths were huge creatures that roamed the forest.
meanings.sent2: The mountain stood tall like a goliaths in the landscape.
meanings.sent3: The goliaths in the movie were so big they had to duck to enter the cave.
meanings.sent4: Facing the challenge felt like taking on a goliaths in the battlefield.
meanings.sent5: The goliaths of the sea, the blue whale, is the largest animal on Earth.

meanings.sent1: The hero bravely fought against the goliaths to protect the village.
meanings.sent2: The team faced a goliaths in the final match of the tournament.
meanings.sent3: The goliaths in the game seemed unbeatable until the underdog team won.
meanings.sent4: Overcoming the goliaths in the business world requires determination and strategy.
meanings.sent5: The goliaths of the jungle, the lion, ruled over its territory with strength and pride.
